local_intent: verify_visibility_and_alignment_before_pick; confirm grasp pose available and robot at target
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose ran earlier and stored pose as white_plate_grasp
Camera provides a clear view of white_plate for detection
Robot can reach and align to white_plate within specified tolerance
coherence_with_global: Implements the verification phase of the global plan: re-detects the white plate, performs approach-and-align (matching LOCAL_ANNOTATION), allows brief settling, then verifies the computed grasp pose and that the robot is at the target before proceeding to Pick.
